titles.title: Sixteenth Sunday in Ordinary Time - Year C Psalms

properties.verseOrder: c1 v1 c1 v2 c1 v3 c1

verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
Lord,
who may abide
in your heart?

verse.name: v1
v2
verse.lines:
Who does no wrong
to a neighbour,
who casts no slur on a friend,
who looks with scorn
on the wicked,
but honours those
who fear the Lord.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Who lends no money
at interest,
and accepts no bribes
against the innocent,
Such a one shall
never be shaken.
